Returns: the current ServiceWorkerWebSettings This value will never be null.
getServiceWorkerWebSettings().Description: Gets the settings for all service workers.

ServiceWorkerController().Description: This class should not be constructed by applications, use @B_android#webkit#ServiceWorkerController#getInstance_E@ instead to fetch the singleton instance.

Returns: the default ServiceWorkerController instance This value will never be null.
getInstance().Description: Returns the default ServiceWorkerController instance. At present there is only one ServiceWorkerController instance for all WebView instances, however this restriction may be relaxed in the future.

Parameters: ServiceWorkerClient: This value may be null.
setServiceWorkerClient(android.webkit.Se.Description: Sets the client to capture service worker related callbacks. A @B_android#webkit#ServiceWorkerClient_E@ should be set before any service workers are active, e.g. a safe place is before any WebView instances are created or pages loaded.
